options_reply_to_author.message: Add a 'Reply to Author' link next to posts

options_reply_to_comment.message: Add a 'Reply' link next to comments

options_fixed_header.message: Float the header as you scroll down the page

options_ctrl_enter_submit.message: Ctrl+Enter submits the current post or comment

options_shift_enter_submit.message: Shift+Enter submits the current post or comment

options_favicon_notify.message: Animate the tab icon when there are new notifications (no sleep mode)

options_extended_shares.message: Adds extra sharing options (Twitter, Facebook, Email) to a share menu

options_original_share.message: Add link to original source of share

options_report_bug.message: Found a bug? Report it on Google Code

options_extension_page.message: Visit the extension page to leave a glowing review

options_extension_plus_page.message: Add Replies and More to your circles on Google+

options_developer_page.message: Follow or complain directly to the developer on Google+
